description: Unordered list component for displaying collections of items. Each item gets automatic semantic ID generation for targeting. Supports nested children in each list item.
useCase: Use for feature lists, bullet points, navigation menus, item collections, step-by-step instructions, and any vertical or horizontal list of elements.

items.description: Array of list items, each with 'children' array of components

style.description: Inline CSS styles for the list container

class.description: CSS classes for layout (flex, grid, space-y, etc.)

id.description: List ID, used to generate item IDs like 'list-id.item-0', 'list-id.item-1'

automation.semanticRole: Collection of list items with auto-generated IDs for each item
automation.note: List items themselves are non-interactive, but can contain interactive children (Links, Buttons). Each <li> element automatically receives data-nav-id attribute.
